title: To-Card Censured Word.
body: It has been brought to my attention that the word, "To Card" is censured while the language filter option is enabled. I have no clue about the reason behind it, and every research so far has failed. If anyone has more information regarding this subject, please provide them to me.

replies.body: That's pretty strange!  I don't have any context on why that would be the case, but report this over to our [Bug Reports](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).  QA can take a look and see if it's something that can be updated.  Thanks for the find!
Alright then, I will get to it.
